shortcuts.title: Toggle Sidebar
shortcuts.description: Toggle the visibility of the sidebar

shortcuts.title: Cut
shortcuts.description: Cut the selected text or line

shortcuts.title: Copy
shortcuts.description: Copy the selected text or line

shortcuts.title: Paste
shortcuts.description: Paste the clipboard content

shortcuts.description: Undo the last action

shortcuts.title: Redo
shortcuts.description: Redo the last action

shortcuts.title: Go to Line
shortcuts.description: Go to a specific line in the active file

shortcuts.description: Open the search box to find text in the active file

shortcuts.description: Open the search box to find and replace text in the active file

shortcuts.description: Add a new cursor above the current one

shortcuts.title: Add Cursor Below
shortcuts.description: Add a new cursor below the current one

shortcuts.description: Toggle the comment status of the selected lines

shortcuts.description: Toggle the visibility of the integrated terminal

shortcuts.description: Toggle full screen mode

shortcuts.description: Open the command palette to execute commands

shortcuts.description: Close the active editor

shortcuts.description: Create a new file

shortcuts.description: Open an existing file

shortcuts.title: Open Folder
shortcuts.description: Open a folder or workspace

shortcuts.description: Go to a symbol (function, variable, etc.) in the active file

shortcuts.description: Peek at the definition of the symbol at the cursor

shortcuts.description: Outdent the selected lines or the current line

shortcuts.description: Reset the zoom level for the active editor
